column1: Kanuru is a neighbourhood of Vijayawada in Krishna district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is an education hub. It is located in Penamaluru mandal of Vijayawada revenue division. As per the G.O. No. M.S.104 (dated:23-03-2017)
column2: Municipal Administration and Urban Development Department
column3: it became a part of Vijayawada metropolitan area.

column2: Kanuru had a population of 49006. Of which male population is 26
column4: 432. The average literacy rate is 85.07% and 4
column5: 401 of the population is under 6 years of age.

column1: The primary and secondary school education is imparted by government
column3: under the School Education Department of the state. The medium of instruction followed by different schools are English

column1: Nidamanuru Railway station and Uppalur Railwaystation are the very near by Railway stations to Kanuru. Vijayawada junction railway station is 13 km (8.1 mi) near to Kanuru.
